mobiles.name: lord krothgar
mobiles.long_description: The Lord Krothgar glares balefully at you.
mobiles.description:
Krothgar, standing at over eight feet tall and clad in full spiked black
plate mail, is an imposing... man. It is said his fists have the power to
rend the very earth asunder if he is angered. It is small wonder the dark
powers have chosen him as their fell agent on Anon.

mobiles.name: death knight
mobiles.long_description: A death knight gazes evilly at you.
mobiles.description:
This fellow and his comrades are servants of the demon lord Marmandes, and
will take only his orders, despite the fact that Krothgar could probably
crush him (and definitely them) with little effort. Krothgar tolerates their
presence in honor of the alliance he has forged with the dark powers to
facilitate the conquest of Anon.

mobiles.name: iron golem
mobiles.long_description: An iron golem stands ready to rend his master's enemies apart.
mobiles.description:
This soulless automaton was created by Krothgar's fell scientist-mages to
serve him as a bodyguard (for appearance's sake only- he scarcely has need
of one) and an executioner. It will kill on a command.

mobiles.name: marmandes demon prince
mobiles.long_description: The demon prince Marmandes watches you curiously.
mobiles.description:
Marmandes has been sent here by his evil masters to observe and aid their
servant Krothgar, and as such he will prefer to avoid direct combat, being
greatly weaker on this plane than on his native, and being eager to see how
Krothgar performs. This does not mean that he will fail to defend himself
to the best of his considerable abilities if the need arises.

mobiles.name: axtraxes arch mage
mobiles.long_description: A vile arch mage screams at your intrusion and attacks!
mobiles.description:
This foul-tempered, evil man is Krothgar's magical assistant and adviser,
and in charge of the dark lord's impressive force of mages. He is infuriated
at your untimely interruption and reacts aggressively.

mobiles.name: high priest
mobiles.long_description: An evil high priest is angered by your sacrilege!
mobiles.description:
You have interrupted this foul priest of unspeakable gods during a very
critical ceremony! He is extremely angry, and so will his worshippers be...
He is a total fanatic and will battle to the death.

mobiles.name: elite guard
mobiles.long_description: An elite guard attempts to prevent you proceeding further.
mobiles.description:
This fellow is clad in full body spiked black plate mail just like his lord,
and carries a HUGE spiked morning star, which he swings casually like it was
but a wooden stick. He cries out upon spotting you, and prepares for combat.

mobiles.name: destrier
mobiles.long_description: A destrier, mount of some evil knight, snorts angrily at you.
mobiles.description:
This mammoth horse must weigh double any other equine steed you have ever
seen. Its jet black coat seems to glow with an inner evil, and you gasp in
astonishment at the satanic gleam in its dark red eyes.

mobiles.name: evil priest
mobiles.long_description: An evil priest screams in fanatical fury!
mobiles.description:
This foul creature is one of the evil priests of the dark lord, and he is
keen to send your soul to him!

mobiles.name: scientist mage
mobiles.long_description: An evil scientist mage roars in fury as you spoil his experiment!
mobiles.description:
You have burst in at a very inappropriate time, and spoiled years of work.
Good ;)

However, the vile mage who is now drooling insanely seems a little upset...

mobiles.name: blackguard guard
mobiles.long_description: A member of the blackguard charges toward you.
mobiles.description:
This guard is a meber of the blackguard, the fanatical warriors who make up
the bulk of Lord Krothgar's evil army.

mobiles.name: red dragon
mobiles.long_description: A red dragon prepares to incinerate you.
mobiles.description:
This dragon is one of Krothgar's five favorites, and is loyal to its master.
Huge teeth protrude from a mouth capable of spewing forth destructive matter
and baleful eyes gleam dangerously from above this maw directly at you. You
regret your intrusion.

mobiles.name: black dragon
mobiles.long_description: A black dragon prepares to incinerate you.
mobiles.description:
This dragon is one of Krothgar's five favorites, and is loyal to its master.
Huge teeth protrude from a mouth capable of spewing forth destructive matter
and baleful eyes gleam dangerously from above this maw directly at you. You
regret your intrusion.

mobiles.name: white dragon
mobiles.long_description: A white dragon prepares to incinerate you.
mobiles.description:
This dragon is one of Krothgar's five favorites, and is loyal to its master.
Huge teeth protrude from a mouth capable of spewing forth destructive matter
and baleful eyes gleam dangerously from above this maw directly at you. You
regret your intrusion.

mobiles.name: blue dragon
mobiles.long_description: A blue dragon prepares to incinerate you.
mobiles.description:
This dragon is one of Krothgar's five favorites, and is loyal to its master.
Huge teeth protrude from a mouth capable of spewing forth destructive matter
and baleful eyes gleam dangerously from above this maw directly at you. You
regret your intrusion.

mobiles.name: green dragon
mobiles.long_description: A green dragon prepares to incinerate you.
mobiles.description:
This dragon is one of Krothgar's five favorites, and is loyal to its master.
Huge teeth protrude from a mouth capable of spewing forth destructive matter
and baleful eyes gleam dangerously from above this maw directly at you. You
regret your intrusion.

mobiles.name: fire elemental
mobiles.long_description: A fire elemental burns everything in sight.
mobiles.description: This magically-summoned being serves the mages of the tower- sometimes.

mobiles.name: efreeti
mobiles.long_description: An efreeti hovers above an iron flask here.
mobiles.description:
This being, summoned from the Elemental Plane of Fire by the flask on the
floor, is not happy, for the power of the flask has been exhausted and he
has no way of returning home. He reacted by slaying first the summoner, and
now he will try to slay you!

mobiles.name: shedu
mobiles.long_description: A shedu sits in a corner of this room.
mobiles.description:
This unfortunate creature was captured by agents of Krothgar, who brought it
here to amuse him. He occasionally spends time torturing it, but has grown
bored and will slay it soon.

mobiles.name: illithid
mobiles.long_description: An evil illithid eyes your cranium off.
mobiles.description:
This foul mind flayer wants brains, and since Krothgar's followers aren't the
brightest of creatures it is near starvation. You are a nice surprise...

mobiles.name: slave
mobiles.long_description: A wretched slave awaits sacrifice.
mobiles.description:
This pathetic wretch has lost all hope. Squatting naked and shivering in the
corner of the cell he gibbers insanely and begs for mercy.

mobiles.name: slave
mobiles.long_description: A female slave will soon "service" Krothgar's legions.
mobiles.description:
This pathetic wretch has lost all hope. Squatting naked and shivering in the
corner of the cell she gibbers insanely and begs for mercy.

mobiles.name: mutant
mobiles.long_description: A hideous mutant drools and screams insanely.
mobiles.description:
These unnatural beings are foul products of the insane experiments of the
scientist mages upon captured slaves in an attempt to create the perfect
fighting race, an experiment finally realised in Korgthar's elite guard.
These failures have been condemned to a dismal life in the pits.

mobiles.name: hydra
mobiles.long_description: A 12 headed hydra roars at you.
mobiles.description:
This mighty creature has allied with Krothgar in exchange for a steady diet
of humans and elves. It will fight ferociously to defend the home of its
meal ticket.

mobiles.name: quasit
mobiles.long_description: A quasit squeaks aggressively at you.
mobiles.description:
This angry creature is the familiar of some mage or another. It is angered
at being seen.

mobiles.name: succubus
mobiles.long_description: A succubus smiles seductively at you.
mobiles.description:
This lustful demoness is the current concubine of Korgthar, though her
appetite is insatiable and she is always on the lookout for new prey... err
... lovers.

mobiles.name: earth elemental
mobiles.long_description: An earth elemental smashes everything in sight.
mobiles.description: This magically-summoned being serves the mages of the tower- sometimes.

mobiles.name: water elemental
mobiles.long_description: A water elemental inundates everything in sight.
mobiles.description: This magically-summoned being serves the mages of the tower- sometimes.

mobiles.name: air elemental
mobiles.long_description: An air elemental blows over everything in sight.
mobiles.description: This magically-summoned being serves the mages of the tower- sometimes.

mobiles.name: hell hound hellhound
mobiles.long_description: A hellhound lopes toward you.
mobiles.description:
Breathing fire and reeking of brimstone, this unholy red-hued hound is indeed
a terrible sight to behold.

mobiles.name: fire giant
mobiles.long_description: A fire giant waves his sword menacingly at you.
mobiles.description:
These fellows are guardians of the massive volcano known as Mount Doom, upon
which rests the inpregnable fortress of their master, Lord Krothgar. They
fight fearlessly to defend it.

mobiles.name: frost giant
mobiles.long_description: A frost giant glares icily at you.
mobiles.description:
These emissaries are here to form an alliance with the forces of Mount Doom.
They do not take kindly to intrusions.

mobiles.name: hill giant
mobiles.long_description: A hill giant grunts at you.
mobiles.description:
These fellows are guardians of the lands surrounding the massive volcano
known as Mount Doom, upon which rests the inpregnable fortress of their
master, Lord Krothgar. They fight fearlessly to defend it.

mobiles.name: cloud giant
mobiles.long_description: A cloud giant laughs mercilessly at you. Hmph.
mobiles.description:
These emissaries are here to form an alliance with the forces of Mount Doom.
They do not take kindly to intrusions.

mobiles.name: ogre
mobiles.long_description: An ogre servant serves the giant soldiers.
mobiles.description:
This fellow may seem huge to you, but by giant standards he's a veritable
runt, as they never cease to point out to him as he makes his way about,
serving food and drinks in between kicks to the head.

mobiles.name: ogre mage
mobiles.long_description: An ogre mage glares suspicously at you.
mobiles.description:
These eastern cousins of the ogres and giants of the west have been invited
here to form an alliance with the troops of Krothgar. They are deeply
suspicious of the arrangement, however, and view all comers with the same
degree of caution, but not aggression.

mobiles.name: troll
mobiles.long_description: A troll foot soldier yawns loudly.
mobiles.description:
These grotesques were bred for combat, not sentry duty, and the boredom is
almost killing them. They don't even notice your presence.

mobiles.name: ettin
mobiles.long_description: An ettin turns both its heads to stare at you.
mobiles.description:
This two-headed giant is a guard of the more important inhabitants of the
fortress. He takes his duties very seriously.

mobiles.name: chief assassin
mobiles.long_description: The chief assassin smiles as she draws her swords.
mobiles.description:
This beauty is actually the lethal head of Krothgar's elite assassins, who
have achieved more for his cause than a dozen armies. She asks for no quarter,
and nor does she give any herself.

mobiles.name: assassin
mobiles.long_description: An assassin prepares for combat.
mobiles.description:
This woman is a member of Krothgar's assassin company, and has slain more
men and women than any one hundred of his regular soldiers.

mobiles.name: drow ambassador
mobiles.long_description: A drow ambassador snarls at you.
mobiles.description:
This priestess is here to secure an alliance between her people and Krothgar's
forces. She is not happy about your intrusion into this matter.

mobiles.name: warg
mobiles.long_description: A hairy warg patrols for trespassers here.
mobiles.description: This beast is a servant of the hill giants who patrol the plains of Doom.

mobiles.name: ghoul
mobiles.long_description: A bloodthirsty ghoul slavers uncontrollably.
mobiles.description: This hideous undead wants to feast on your flesh!

mobiles.name: vampire
mobiles.long_description: A vampire smiles at you...
mobiles.description:
This vamp is treacherous and deadly. You can see why Krothgar likes having
her around...

mobiles.name: lich
mobiles.long_description: An ancient lich awakens from his slumber and looks around.
mobiles.description:
Even the mages of Krothgar know not of the existence of this secret tomb.
Buried within is the old lord of the Fortress, who was imprisoned in here
by the forces of Good ages ago. And now you have woken him up. Way to go
slick.

mobiles.name: stone golem
mobiles.long_description: A stone golem stands ready to rend his master's enemies apart.
mobiles.description:
This soulless automaton was created by Krothgar's fell evil priests to
serve him as a bodyguard (for appearance's sake only- he scarcely has need
of one) and an executioner. It will kill on a command.

mobiles.name: keeper
mobiles.short_description: The keeper of the mutant pit
mobiles.long_description: The Keeper of the Mutant Pit snarls angrily at you.

mobiles.name: naga princess
mobiles.long_description: A princess of the Naga glares haughtily at you.
mobiles.description:
This snake with a woman's head seems unimpressed by your intrusion, but
she refrains from attacking, hoping that the guards of the castle will see
to you so she doesn't have to expend energy fighting.

objects.name: krothgar armor
objects.description: The armor of Lord Krothgar lies here.

objects.name: krothgar sword
objects.description: The sword of Lord Krothgar is here.

objects.name: krothgar shield
objects.description: The shield of Lord Krothgar is here.

objects.name: krothgar helm
objects.short_description: the cursed helm of Lord Krothgar
objects.description: The cursed helm of Lord Krothgar is here.

objects.name: two handed sword
objects.description: A two-handed sword lies here.

objects.name: burnt helm
objects.description: A burnt helm painted with a hideous visage lies here.

objects.name: iron fist
objects.description: The legendary iron fist lies here.

objects.name: barbed flail
objects.description: A demon's barbed flail lies here.

objects.name: flaming spear
objects.description: A flaming spear burns into the ground here.

objects.name: staff power
objects.description: A staff of power has been left here.

objects.name: robes archmage
objects.description: The robes of the archmage are crumpled up in a corner here.

objects.name: vial dust
objects.description: A vial of magic dust is here.

objects.name: dagger
objects.description: A sacrificial dagger is stuck in the ground here.

objects.name: robes
objects.description: The high priest's robes lie here.

objects.name: mask
objects.description: The high priest's ceremonial mask is here.

objects.name: spiked plate mail
objects.short_description: a suit of spiked plate mail
objects.description: A suit of spiked plate mail has been foolishly discarded here.

objects.name: morning star
objects.description: A huge morning star is buried in the ground here.

objects.name: helm
objects.description: A dark helm lies here.

objects.name: dagger
objects.description: A sacrificial dagger is stuck in the ground here.

objects.name: robes
objects.description: The priest's robes lie here.

objects.name: mask
objects.description: The priest's ceremonial mask is here.

objects.name: mage robes
objects.description: Some dirty robes covered in chemical stains lie here.

objects.name: wand
objects.description: A magic wand is here.

objects.name: elixir chemicals
objects.description: An elixir of noxious chemicals bubbles away here.

objects.name: dragon scale
objects.description: A huge dragon scale has been dropped here.

objects.name: tooth
objects.description: A dragon's tooth lies here.

objects.name: claw
objects.description: A pair of dragon claws is here.

objects.name: hide
objects.description: A dragon hide is piled up here.

objects.name: brazier
objects.description: A bronze brazier is here.

objects.name: flask
objects.description: This flask has been drained of all magical properties.

objects.name: manacles
objects.description: A pair of manacles lies here.

objects.name: robes
objects.description: An illithid's robes lie here, discarded.

objects.name: gem
objects.description: This gem pulses evilly.

objects.name: chest
objects.description: A heavy chest rests here.

objects.name: treasure
objects.description: A great treasure lies here.

objects.name: bed
objects.description: A luxurious bed sits here.

objects.name: silk
objects.description: Some expensive silk has been left here.

objects.name: stone
objects.description: A stone is here.

objects.name: bowl
objects.description: A bowl is here.

objects.name: censer
objects.description: A censer is here.

objects.name: spiked collar
objects.description: A spiked collar rests here.

objects.name: sword
objects.description: A giant sword rests here.

objects.name: rock
objects.description: A throwing rock lies on the ground here.

objects.name: club
objects.description: A normal wooden club lies here.

objects.name: collar
objects.description: A slave collar lies here.

objects.name: glaive
objects.description: A glaive has been left propped up here.

objects.name: potion
objects.description: A magical potion rolls around on the floor here.

objects.name: pole arm
objects.description: A pole arm lies here.

objects.name: chainmail
objects.description: A tight-fitting suit of black chainmail lies here.

objects.name: black sword
objects.description: The black sword glows here.

objects.name: blue sword
objects.description: The blue sword hums here.

objects.name: black robes
objects.description: Some black robes with no special properties lie here.

objects.name: vial poison
objects.description: A vial of poison is here.

objects.name: drow cloak
objects.description: A black Drow cloak is crumpled on the floor here.

objects.name: drow boots
objects.description: A pair of black drow boots is here.

objects.name: drow chain chainmail
objects.description: A suit of finely crafted adamantite chainmail is here.

objects.name: tentacle whip
objects.description: A rod with several writhing tentacles attached is here.

objects.name: tiara
objects.description: A tiara lies here.

objects.name: key
objects.description: This key allows access to the upper levels.

objects.name: plate dark undead
objects.description: A large plate is lying on the floor.

rooms.name: Approaching the Plains of Mount Doom
rooms.description:
You are heading directly toward Mount Doom, on a narrow path that leads to
the desolate, monster-infested plains that surround it. This is the fell
domain of Lord Krothgar, whose forbidding black fortress can be seen atop the
peak of the extinct volcano called by humans Mount Doom. Armies of giants
patrol the lower slopes, while evil mutants, mages and demons guard the
fortress itself. Steeling yourself, you push on.

rooms.name: The Plains of Mount Doom
rooms.description:
A chill wind blows across the desolate wastes, and you shiver uncomfortably
as you proceed. The bones of past adventurers lay scattered across the
hard ground, among rusted weapons and shards of jagged rock that resemble
teeth. It almost looks as if the very earth had devoured them. But the
sudden howl of a warg (or a ghoul) alerts you to the very real dangers
lurking nearby and you press on.

rooms.name: The Plains of Mount Doom
rooms.description:
A chill wind blows across the desolate wastes, and you shiver uncomfortably
as you proceed. The bones of past adventurers lay scattered across the
hard ground, among rusted weapons and shards of jagged rock that resemble
teeth. It almost looks as if the very earth had devoured them. But the
sudden howl of a warg (or a ghoul) alerts you to the very real dangers
lurking nearby and you press on.

sudden howl of a warg (or a ghoul) alerts you to the very real dangers

rooms.name: The Plains of Mount Doom
rooms.description:
A chill wind blows across the desolate wastes, and you shiver uncomfortably
as you proceed. The bones of past adventurers lay scattered across the
hard ground, among rusted weapons and shards of jagged rock that resemble
teeth. It almost looks as if the very earth had devoured them. But the
sudden howl of a warg (or a ghoul) alerts you to the very real dangers
lurking nearby and you press on.

rooms.name: The Foothills of Mount Doom
rooms.description:
You have come to the base of the mountain. From here you may continue to
slowly make your way up the mountain, or head back to the eerie plains below.
The ground here is rocky and treacherous, dotted by small crevices in the
volcanic rock and jagged shards of granite protrustions. The wind is even
stronger here than on the plains, and you fancy you can hear voices and
screams.

rooms.name: The Foothills of Mount Doom
rooms.description:
You have come to the base of the mountain. From here you may continue to
slowly make your way up the mountain, or head back to the eerie plains below.
The ground here is rocky and treacherous, dotted by small crevices in the
volcanic rock and jagged shards of granite protrustions. The wind is even
stronger here than on the plains, and you fancy you can hear voices and
screams.

The ground here is rocky and treacherous, dotted by small crevices in the

stronger here than on the plains, and you fancy you can hear voices and
screams.

teeth. It almost looks as if the very earth had devoured them. But the

rooms.name: The Foothills of Mount Doom
rooms.description:
You have come to the base of the mountain. From here you may continue to
slowly make your way up the mountain, or head back to the eerie plains below.
The ground here is rocky and treacherous, dotted by small crevices in the
volcanic rock and jagged shards of granite protrustions. The wind is even
stronger here than on the plains, and you fancy you can hear voices and
screams.

rooms.name: The Upper Slopes of Mount Doom
rooms.description:
You are steadily drawing near the summit. The ground has become quite smooth
here, to the point of sliperiness, and you stop more than once to regain your
footing on the glassy obsidian that coats the upper slopes. The fortress
of Lord Krogthar looms closer than ever now, and you mentally prepare
yourself for the the upcoming battles. The foes you have fought so far have
been minor compared to those to come.

rooms.name: The Upper Slopes of Mount Doom
rooms.description:
You are steadily drawing near the summit. The ground has become quite smooth
here, to the point of sliperiness, and you stop more than once to regain your
footing on the glassy obsidian that coats the upper slopes. The fortress
of Lord Krogthar looms closer than ever now, and you mentally prepare
yourself for the the upcoming battles. The foes you have fought so far have
been minor compared to those to come.

The fortress lies directly north of here.

rooms.name: The Upper Slopes of Mount Doom
rooms.description:

here, to the point of sliperiness, and you stop more than once to regain your
footing on the glassy obsidian that coats the upper slopes. The fortress

been minor compared to those to come.

rooms.name: The Foothills of Mount Doom
rooms.description:
You have come to the base of the mountain. From here you may continue to
slowly make your way up the mountain, or head back to the eerie plains below.
The ground here is rocky and treacherous, dotted by small crevices in the
volcanic rock and jagged shards of granite protrustions. The wind is even
stronger here than on the plains, and you fancy you can hear voices and
screams.

rooms.name: The Upper Slopes of Mount Doom
rooms.description:
You are steadily drawing near the summit. The ground has become quite smooth
here, to the point of sliperiness, and you stop more than once to regain your
footing on the glassy obsidian that coats the upper slopes. The fortress
of Lord Krogthar looms closer than ever now, and you mentally prepare
yourself for the the upcoming battles. The foes you have fought so far have
been minor compared to those to come.

The Fortress lies directly east of here.

rooms.name: Outside the Fortress of Lord Korgthar
rooms.description:
You have finally reached the summit, and are standing beneath the gates of
the Fortress, which you may climb up to by means of an iron staircase. You
can sense many pairs of eyes upon you, and you wonder how far you will be
permitted to go before Korgthar's forces combine and crush you.

rooms.name: The Upper Slopes of Mount Doom
rooms.description:
You are steadily drawing near the summit. The ground has become quite smooth
here, to the point of sliperiness, and you stop more than once to regain your
footing on the glassy obsidian that coats the upper slopes. The fortress
of Lord Krogthar looms closer than ever now, and you mentally prepare
yourself for the the upcoming battles. The foes you have fought so far have
been minor compared to those to come.

The Fortress lies due west of here.

rooms.name: The Foothills of Mount Doom
rooms.description:
You have come to the base of the mountain. From here you may continue to
slowly make your way up the mountain, or head back to the eerie plains below.
The ground here is rocky and treacherous, dotted by small crevices in the
volcanic rock and jagged shards of granite protrustions. The wind is even
stronger here than on the plains, and you fancy you can hear voices and
screams.

rooms.name: The Plains of Mount Doom
rooms.description:
A chill wind blows across the desolate wastes, and you shiver uncomfortably
as you proceed. The bones of past adventurers lay scattered across the
hard ground, among rusted weapons and shards of jagged rock that resemble
teeth. It almost looks as if the very earth had devoured them. But the
sudden howl of a warg (or a ghoul) alerts you to the very real dangers
lurking nearby and you press on.

rooms.name: The Plains of Mount Doom
rooms.description:

sudden howl of a warg (or a ghoul) alerts you to the very real dangers
lurking nearby and you press on.

rooms.description:
A chill wind blows across the desolate wastes, and you shiver uncomfortably
as you proceed. The bones of past adventurers lay scattered across the
hard ground, among rusted weapons and shards of jagged rock that resemble
teeth. It almost looks as if the very earth had devoured them. But the
sudden howl of a warg (or a ghoul) alerts you to the very real dangers
lurking nearby and you press on.

rooms.name: Inside the Fell Fortress
rooms.description:
You are standing inside the gates of the fortress, at a crossroads. The
passages are remarkably plain for a den of evil- simply dressed grey flag
stones on floor and walls, the monotony broken only by the occasional torch
sconce or tattered tapestry. It is evident that this castle has known many
inhabitants prior to its current ones.

rooms.name: The Cell Block
rooms.description:
Here the prisoner of Krogthar are kept. There are not many cells, as the
Lord Korgthar is not fond of taking prisoners (hassles, hassles...). If
you think security is a little lax, think of what lurks outside to deter
potentianl escapees...

rooms.name: A Cell
rooms.description:
A dank, dismal affair with little in the way of bedding or toilet facilities.
The stench is actually quite horrendous and you find yourself eager to leave.

rooms.name: A Cell
rooms.description:
A dank, dismal affair with little in the way of bedding or toilet facilities.
The stench is actually quite horrendous and you find yourself eager to leave.

rooms.name: The Cell Block
rooms.description:
Here the prisoner of Krogthar are kept. There are not many cells, as the
Lord Korgthar is not fond of taking prisoners (hassles, hassles...). If
you think security is a little lax, think of what lurks outside to deter
potentianl escapees...

rooms.name: A Cell
rooms.description:
A dank, dismal affair with little in the way of bedding or toilet facilities.
The stench is actually quite horrendous and you find yourself eager to leave.

rooms.name: A Cell
rooms.description:
A dank, dismal affair with little in the way of bedding or toilet facilities.
The stench is actually quite horrendous and you find yourself eager to leave.

rooms.name: A Cell
rooms.description:
A dank, dismal affair with little in the way of bedding or toilet facilities.
The stench is actually quite horrendous and you find yourself eager to leave.

rooms.name: Some Quarters
rooms.description:
You are standing before a solid wooden door that leads to the quarters of
some of the many types of troops that serve Krothgar.

rooms.name: An Ante-Room
rooms.description:
You are standing in a well-furnished anteroom with doors leading in all four
directions. No noise comes from behind any- they are quite solid and are
effectively soundproof.

rooms.name: Assassins' Quarters
rooms.description:
In this room reside some of the assassins that serve Korthgar. He may not
be the brightest of tyrants, but Krothgar was smart enough to work out it was
easier to send a single assassin to slay a king and collapse an empire than
it was to conquer it by brute force. His assassins live in comfort, as he
values them highly.

rooms.name: The Chief Assassin's Quarters
rooms.description:
You have entered the quarters of the Chief of Krothgar's ruthlessly
efficient assassins, and caught her in flagrante delicto with two naked men
strapped to racks. She swears and draws her swords, making no attempt to
cover herself, slaying her slaves before moving to confront you.

rooms.name: Assassins' Quarters
rooms.description:
In this room reside some of the assassins that serve Korthgar. He may not
be the brightest of tyrants, but Krothgar was smart enough to work out it was
easier to send a single assassin to slay a king and collapse an empire than
it was to conquer it by brute force. His assassins live in comfort, as he
values them highly.

rooms.name: Some Quarters
rooms.description:
You are standing before a solid wooden door that leads to the quarters of
some of the many types of troops that serve Krothgar.

rooms.name: A Corridor
rooms.description:
You are advancing along a dark corridor that leads to the quarters of Lord
Krothgar's blackguard.

rooms.name: The Keeper's Chamber
rooms.description:
Here resides the keeper of the Mutant Pit, where the failed experiments of
the scientist mages are kept to do away with prisoners or insolent guards.
He likes his job, and isn't about to let you hurt his mutants.

rooms.name: The Mutant Pit
rooms.description:
Ack! You're in the mutant pit! Surrounded by gore, excrement, mucous, vomit
and the remains of dying mutants, you gag and choke and struggle to get out,
only to find your way blocked by several mutants...

rooms.name: A Corridor
rooms.description:
You are advancing along a dark corridor that leads to the quarters of Lord
Krothgar's blackguard.

rooms.name: The Guard Common Room
rooms.description:
Doors lead in all directions from this messy rec room. Blood, beer and food
stain the straw-covered floor while decomposing human, orc and ogre corpse
hang from hooks in the ceiling, evidently used as practice dummies.

exits.description: This door reads- "Upper level access. Authorised personnel only!

rooms.name: Guard Quarters
rooms.description:
This rooms is full of messy bunks and snoring guards. Dice and cards are
scattered across the filthy stone floor, and rats gnaw at the boots of the
guards.

rooms.name: Guard Quarters
rooms.description:
This rooms is full of messy bunks and snoring guards. Dice and cards are
scattered across the filthy stone floor, and rats gnaw at the boots of the
guards.

rooms.name: Guest Quarters
rooms.description:
Down this southern corridor lie the guest rooms, where the many emissaries
from the powerful races Krothgar is attempting to gain as allies currently
reside. They frown upon intruders...

rooms.name: Guest Quarters
rooms.description:
Down this southern corridor lie the guest rooms, where the many emissaries
from the powerful races Krothgar is attempting to gain as allies currently
reside. They frown upon intruders...

rooms.name: Guest Quarters
rooms.description:
These quarters are well-decorated, with well-preserved tapestries and rugs,
and carved wooden furniture. Alliances with other powers are crucial to
Krothgar's plans, and he is doing his best to impress his diabolical guests.

rooms.name: Guest Quarters
rooms.description:
These quarters are well-decorated, with well-preserved tapestries and rugs,
and carved wooden furniture. Alliances with other powers are crucial to
Krothgar's plans, and he is doing his best to impress his diabolical guests.

rooms.name: Guest Quarters
rooms.description:
Down this southern corridor lie the guest rooms, where the many emissaries
from the powerful races Krothgar is attempting to gain as allies currently
reside. They frown upon intruders...

rooms.name: Guest Quarters
rooms.description:
These quarters are well-decorated, with well-preserved tapestries and rugs,
and carved wooden furniture. Alliances with other powers are crucial to
Krothgar's plans, and he is doing his best to impress his diabolical guests.

rooms.name: Guest Quarters
rooms.description:
These quarters are well-decorated, with well-preserved tapestries and rugs,
and carved wooden furniture. Alliances with other powers are crucial to
Krothgar's plans, and he is doing his best to impress his diabolical guests.

rooms.name: Guest Quarters
rooms.description:
These quarters are well-decorated, with well-preserved tapestries and rugs,
and carved wooden furniture. Alliances with other powers are crucial to
Krothgar's plans, and he is doing his best to impress his diabolical guests.

rooms.name: The Fortress
rooms.description:
You have entered the restricted area. Staircases run up and down from here,
and a narrow passage stretches away to the west.

rooms.name: A Narrow Corridor
rooms.description:
This corridor runs through the center of the Fortress to the mage towers,
on the western wall of the fortress. A junction lies to the west.

rooms.name: A Junction
rooms.description:
You may head through doors to the north or south from here, or back east
to the outer fortress. There is a sign on the south door, and a plaque on
the northern.

extra_descriptions.description:
The sign reads-

        The Quarters of the Archmage. Please do not enter. Important
        experiment in progress. Leave messages with the guards.

        - Axtraxes.

The plaque reads-

       "T H E   E L E M E N T A L   L A B O R A T O R I E S "

       Keep out!

       - Axtraxes.

rooms.name: The Quarters of the Archmage
rooms.description:
You have barged into the quarters of Axtraxes, arch mage of Krothgar, and
ruined his experiment. He's BOUND to be upset.

rooms.name: The Elemental Laboratories
rooms.description:
This vast room extends in all directions. You see vats, urns, beakers, jars,
alembics and a hundred other items scattered about on desks, benches, chairs
and floors. Everything appears rather damaged, as if someone (or something)
has recently gone berserk in here...

rooms.name: Western End of the Lab
rooms.description:
This vast room extends in all directions. You see vats, urns, beakers, jars,
alembics and a hundred other items scattered about on desks, benches, chairs
and floors. Everything appears rather damaged, as if someone (or something)
has recently gone berserk in here...

rooms.name: Northern End of the Lab
rooms.description:
This vast room extends in all directions. You see vats, urns, beakers, jars,
alembics and a hundred other items scattered about on desks, benches, chairs
and floors. Everything appears rather damaged, as if someone (or something)
has recently gone berserk in here...

rooms.name: Eastern End of the Lab
rooms.description:
This vast room extends in all directions. You see vats, urns, beakers, jars,
alembics and a hundred other items scattered about on desks, benches, chairs
and floors. Everything appears rather damaged, as if someone (or something)
has recently gone berserk in here...

rooms.name: The Lower Chambers
rooms.description:
You have entered the lower levels of the Fortress, where hideous creatures
lurk and evil priests engage in foul ceremonies to their demonic deities.

rooms.name: An Ancient Crypt
rooms.description:
This crypt has remained untouched for centuries. It houses the remains of
the foul lich king who once ruled this Fortress and much of the surrounding
land under an iron fist (literally, Krothgar's golem now wears it). You
better hope he stayed dead...

rooms.name: The Unholy Temple
rooms.description:
You have entered the grounds of the unholy temple of the Fortress. Screaming
virgins are torn asunder in foul rituals upon altars soaked with the blood
of thousands of innocents while evil priests look on and pray for a visitation
from their gods.

rooms.name: The Unholy Temple
rooms.description:
You have entered the grounds of the unholy temple of the Fortress. Screaming
virgins are torn asunder in foul rituals upon altars soaked with the blood
of thousands of innocents while evil priests look on and pray for a visitation
from their gods.

The altar is directly before you, and you see the high priest standing
behind it, about to sacrifice another virgin.

rooms.name: The Unholy Temple
rooms.description:
You have entered the grounds of the unholy temple of the Fortress. Screaming
virgins are torn asunder in foul rituals upon altars soaked with the blood
of thousands of innocents while evil priests look on and pray for a visitation
from their gods. Down from here lairs Jher, ally of Krogthar.

rooms.name: The Hydra Lair
rooms.description:
Here Krothgar keeps his hydra, which guards the treasure of the evil temple.
It is a wild and ferocious beast, which will tear apart anything that enters
its lair save Krothgar or the high priest.

rooms.name: A Spiral Staircase
rooms.description:
You are ascending a spiral staircase that winds up into the heights of the
multitude of towers that adorn the heights of the Fortress.

rooms.name: A Landing
rooms.description:
You have come to a landing, upon which are 4 doors leading in the cardinal
directions. The staircase continues its climb in the center.

rooms.name: A Bedchamber
rooms.description:
You have entered a luxurious boudoir full of expensive furniture and a wide
variety of perfumes, unguents and other cosmetics. Piles of clothing are
piled on the floor, as if someone had but recently gone through them in
search of an outfit.

rooms.name: A Bedchamber
rooms.description:
You have entered a luxurious boudoir full of expensive furniture and a wide
variety of perfumes, unguents and other cosmetics. Piles of clothing are
piled on the floor, as if someone had but recently gone through them in
search of an outfit.

rooms.name: A Hall
rooms.description:
You have entered a long dining hall filled with a huge table lined with
high-backed chairs. Seated in these chairs are skeletons (the normal sort)
clad in royal regalia- these are the many opponents that Krothgar has
vanquished. He keeps their mortal remains here as trophies.

rooms.name: A Bedchamber
rooms.description:
You have entered a luxurious boudoir full of expensive furniture and a wide
variety of perfumes, unguents and other cosmetics. Piles of clothing are
piled on the floor, as if someone had but recently gone through them in
search of an outfit.

rooms.name: A Spiral Staircase
rooms.description:
You are ascending a spiral staircase that winds up into the heights of the
multitude of towers that adorn the heights of the Fortress.

rooms.name: The Throne Room
rooms.description:
You have entered the Throne Room of Lord Krothgar. He sits here, upon his
throne, located in the center of the 5 towers which emerge in all directions
from this room. In each tower resides a powerful dragon, loyal allies of the
Lord. Long wall hangings depict the many victories won by Krothgar, and
in between them stand members of his elite guard, ready to defend their lord.

rooms.name: Dragon Tower
rooms.description:
In this tower rests a huge dragon, the largest of its kind. It will not
appreciate being disturbed by a mortal such as yourself...

rooms.name: Dragon Tower
rooms.description:
In this tower rests a huge dragon, the largest of its kind. It will not
appreciate being disturbed by a mortal such as yourself...

rooms.name: Dragon Tower
rooms.description:
In this tower rests a huge dragon, the largest of its kind. It will not
appreciate being disturbed by a mortal such as yourself...

rooms.name: Dragon Tower
rooms.description:
In this tower rests a huge dragon, the largest of its kind. It will not
appreciate being disturbed by a mortal such as yourself...

rooms.name: Dragon Tower
rooms.description:
In this tower rests a huge dragon, the largest of its kind. It will not
appreciate being disturbed by a mortal such as yourself...

rooms.name: Stables
rooms.description:
Here, the blackguard keep their steeds, evil destriers bred on the plains
of Hel itself.
